channel.title: Is internal MIDI feedback possible?
channel.description:
to clarify the question:
at the moment i am working on sequencer objects for the launchpad. monophnic seqencers or trigger sequencers are no problem because the input from the launchpad can be transformed to multiple outlets of the object (e.g. trigger outs for drums).
in the object itself it's easy to generate polyphonic MIDI messages and to send them via the hardware ports to an extern synth. But how can i use this polyphonic MIDI information to control polyphonic axoloti patches?
is it possible to treat this generated MIDI information the same way as incoming polyphonic MIDI messages?
thank you for your time and your creative solutions!

item.title: Is internal MIDI feedback possible?
item.dc:creator: @beat
item.description:
@beat wrote:

thank you! i will try this hint as soon as i am next to my axoloti!

Read full topic

item.title: Is internal MIDI feedback possible?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

beat:

is it possible to treat this generated MIDI information the same way as incoming polyphonic MIDI messages?

The midi/intern/... objects should do that

Read full topic
